shows.title: Secret Door Special
shows.guests: Ron Janix, Whitley Strieber, Susanne Wilson, Jim Harold
shows.first_half: Who's behind the Secret Door? George Noory welcomed four surprise guests, trying to identify each based solely on their disguised voices and the topics they discussed.

shows.title: Numerology for 2026 / Mental Techniques
shows.first_half: First Half: Numerologist Glynis McCants shares her numerological insights on what to expect in the new year 2026, and how to prepare for it. She'll delve into the significant shift about to take place, our Personal Year Cycles, and what's in store for some of the most influential world leaders.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Mentalist Jim Karol will discuss the power of the human mind and its infinite capabilities. He'll talk about his unique approach that combines cognitive fitness and mentalism, and demonstrate how anyone can enhance their mental strength, memory, and focus, using simple techniques.

shows.title: Alien Interactions / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Author of "The Plejaren Diaries," Zaysan "Z" Saldausky (William Saldausky), best known as "Z," joins guest host Connie Willis (info) to discuss his interactions and deepening relationship with a group of aliens. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Connie a call and talk about whatever is on your mind!
